definition: (computer) character repertoire/glossary, lexicon
Zihui, Chinese character dictionary with 33,179 entries, released in 17th century
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
class/collection

sentences.english: If you study regularly each day, little by little your vocabulary of English words will increase.
sentences.chinese: 如果你每天有規律地學習，你的英文字彙將逐漸增加。

sentences.english: Here are some tips to help you boost your word power.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一些忠告來幫助你增強字彙能力。

sentences.english: The questions on the Word Analysis test assess how well students can recognize letters and letter-sound relationships.
sentences.chinese: 字彙分析是測驗學生對字母和其相對發音的熟悉度。

sentences.english: Is this the extent of your vocabularies?
sentences.chinese: 你的字彙程度就到只到此嗎？

sentences.english: We can expand our vocabulary by reading English magazines.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以藉由看英文雜誌來擴充字彙。

sentences.english: If you study regularly each day, step by step your vocabulary will increase.
sentences.chinese: 如果你每天規律地學習，字彙能力就會漸漸進步。

sentences.english: Improve your business vocabulary and learn essential writing skills in English.
sentences.chinese: 改善你的商業字彙和必備的寫作技巧。

sentences.english: Kevin reads the dictionary to learn more vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 凱文看字典來學習更多的字彙。

sentences.english: Teacher: In this exercise, children also enlarge their vocabularies at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 在這個活動中，孩童也同時擴大了他們的字彙量。

definition: sound and meaning
Yi Zhuan, commentary on the "Book of Changes" or "I Ching" 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
ancient meaning/original or etymological meaning of a word
phonetic component of a Chinese character
Guliang Annals, commentary on the Spring and Autumn Annals 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], first published during the Han Dynasty
rime dictionary (ancient type of Chinese dictionary that collates characters by tone and rhyme rather than by radical)
Kong Yingda (574-648), Confucian scholar
character book (i.e. school primer)
The School Sayings of Confucius (abbr. for 孔子家語|孔子家语[Kong3 zi3 Jia1 yu3])
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
phono-semantic compound character
Mincho/Song font

Prime tortoise of the record bureau, Song dynasty historical encyclopedia of political essays, autobiography, memorials and decrees, compiled 1005-1013 under Wang Qinruo 王欽若|王钦若 and Yang Yi 楊億|杨亿, 1000 scrolls
The Artificer's Record, a technology treaty compiled towards the end of the Spring and Autumn period
Mr Gongyang's Annals or commentary on 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], early history, probably written by multiple authors during Han dynasty, same as 公羊春秋[Gong1 yang2 Chun1 qiu1]
Hanyu Da Zidian, one of the most comprehensive Chinese character dictionaries with 54,678 (and later 60,370) entries, first published between 1986-1990
